rescript.settings.askToStartBuild.description: Whether you want the extension to prompt for autostarting a ReScript build if a project is opened with no build running.

rescript.settings.binaryPath.description: Path to the directory where ReScript binaries are. You can use it if you haven't or don't want to use the installed ReScript from node_modules in your project.

rescript.settings.inlayHints.maxLength.markdownDescription: Maximum length of character for inlay hints. Set to null to have an unlimited length. Inlay hints that exceed the maximum length will not be shown.
